newsitem.title: USA: Terex files to offer seven mln common shrs.
newsitem.headline: Terex files to offer seven mln common shrs.

text.p: Terex Corp filed Friday with the Securities and Exchange Commission to sell up to seven million common shares.

Of the total amount, the company will offer five million shares for sale while selling stockholders will offer two million commom shares, Terex said in the filing. After the offering, outstanding shares will total 18,646,699 common.
The company granted the underwriters a 30-day overallotment option to purchase up to 700,000 additional shares. The offering will be led Credit Suisse First Boston.
Net proceeds will be used to redeem a portion of senior secured notes.
Based in Westport, Conn., Terex is a global manufacturer of a broad range of construction and mining related capital equipment.
